name: Monthly Sketch Order Form for Delivery
query:
SELECT 
    DATE_FORMAT(delivery_date, '%%Y-%%m-%%d') AS `Delivery Date`,
    COUNT(name) AS `Total Orders`,
    SUM(CASE WHEN docstatus = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Submitted,
    SUM(CASE WHEN docstatus = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Pending,
    SUM(CASE WHEN Workflow_state = 'Cancelled' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS Cancelled
FROM `tabSketch Order Form`
WHERE 
    (%(branch)s IS NULL OR branch = %(branch)s)
     AND (%(year)s IS NULL OR YEAR(delivery_date) = %(year)s)
     AND (%(month)s IS NULL OR month(delivery_date) = %(month)s)

GROUP BY delivery_date
ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
report_name: Monthly Sketch Order Form for Delivery
